Magnetic Field:
$$\begin{split} &
\mathscr{B} = 
\frac{1}{2} \frac{1}{2\pi} \mu_0 \frac{q}{r^2} \left( \vec{v} \times \frac{\vec{r}}{r} \right) = 
\nabla \times \mathscr{A} \ne \frac{\mathscr{E}}{v}
\end{split}$${#eq-field_mag}

Lorentz Force: 
$$\begin{split} &
F_{B} =q(v \times \mathscr{B})
\end{split}$${#eq-lorentzforce}

Vector Potential: $\mathscr{A}$
